response.job_title: Estudiante en alternancia Informatique et Réseaux parcours Développement Logiciel IMT Mines Alès
response.summary:
Automation Tester with extensive knowledge in Java, Python, SQL, and NoSQL, and intermediate knowledge in JavaScript and TypeScript. I have experience in manual and automated testing of APIs and UI, and I have used tools such as Mocha, Chai, Karate DSL, Selenium, Playwright, Rest Assured, Postman, Jira, among others. Additionally, I have worked on the design, implementation, and maintenance of frameworks for automated testing. I also have experience in manual testing, running suites, writing tests, and reporting bugs. Furthermore, I have worked with platforms such as AWS, GCP, and have some experience in using Jenkins. Similarly, I have worked with agile methodologies, especially with the Scrum methodology.

I am someone who is frequently seeking to acquire new knowledge and apply new technologies. I am a highly creative person who is always thinking about new solutions, plans for the future, and how to implement them. I have a great analytical capacity and constantly think about how to improve processes and make them more efficient. My commitment and dedication drive me to not leave tasks unfinished and to seek ways to overcome obstacles. I am a very empathetic person; I love listening to others and helping them.

My hobbies include art, literature, and languages., literature, and languages. Currently, I speak English, French, Italian, and Spanish as my native language.

If you are looking for a highly creative person who is always willing to learn and contribute, do not hesitate to connect with me.
response.skills: Linux, Zephyr, Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Jenkins, Jira, Italian, GraphQL, REST APIs, Test Automation, API Testing, Teamwork, Postman API, JavaScript, English, Cucumber, NoSQL, Python, Java, SQL

education.degree_name: Informatique et Réseaux parcours Développement Logiciel

company.name: Resolvit
company.description: Founded in 2002, Resolvit, LLC, is an international IT and business solutions partner to world-class companies and government agencies in the US, Latin America, and Asia. Our company combines expertise and comprehensive capabilities across the telecommunications, technology services, retail, education, manufacturing & distribution, financial services, and health care/life science industries. Resolvit delivers strategic insight and actionable solutions to streamline operations, reduce costs, and generate revenue. That’s how we Reimagine our Clients’ Realities.
